scripts.build: for f in circuits/*; do if [ -d "$f" ]; then (cd "$f" && nargo compile && nargo build); fi; done
scripts.export-app: mkdir -p ../app/artifacts/circuits && for f in circuits/*; do if [ -d "$f" ]; then (cd "$f" && cp ./target/$(basename "$f").json ../../../app/artifacts/circuits/$(basename "$f").json); fi; done
scripts.export-contracts: mkdir -p ../contracts/src/verifiers && bun run scripts/generate-solidity-verifiers.ts && for f in circuits/*; do if [ -d "$f" ]; then (cd "$f" && cp ./target/$(basename "$f")_verifier.sol ../../../contracts/src/verifiers/$(basename "$f")_verifier.sol); fi; done
